MESSAGES.INFO_AVAILABLE_DATE: Data will not be available 2 days after the date
MESSAGES.INFO_CHECK_LOCK_SUGGESTIONS: When everyone has added their suggestions, click on the check icon to allow them to revel their Secret Santa
MESSAGES.INFO_CREATE_CONFIRMATION: All set, review the information and click done to create the Secret Santa
MESSAGES.INFO_GIFT_SUGGESTIONS: Now is time to tell us some gift suggestions, share up to {{value}} gifts that you would like to receive, you can leave it blank if you want to keep it a surprise. You can edit it until the responsible for the Secret Santa draw the names
MESSAGES.INFO_LOCK_SUGGESTION_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to close the suggestions? Double check if everyone has added their suggestions, because after that you can't change it. Click "Yes" to make the Secret Santa available to reveal
MESSAGES.INFO_REVEALED_BEFORE: It was revealed {{count}} times before, keep your link somewhere safe, because anyone with your link can reveal your secret santa
MESSAGES.INFO_REVEALED_NO_SUGGESTIONS: {{name}} didn't give any suggestions, be creative!
MESSAGES.INFO_REVEALED_SUGGESTIONS: Here are some gift suggestions from {{name}}:
MESSAGES.INFO_REVEAL_INSTRUCTIONS: Click on the gift above to see who you got
MESSAGES.INFO_SAVING_WITHOUT_SUGGESTIONS: If you save like this, it means that you are accept surprises and don't want to give any hints to your Secret Santa
MESSAGES.INFO_SHARE_REVEAL: Share the links with the participants so they can reveal who they got
MESSAGES.INFO_SHARE_SUGGESTIONS: It's time for the participants to add their suggestions!
MESSAGES.INFO_SS_LINK: Share the links with the participants. You should also copy this page link it and save somewhere safe, because you might need this links again
MESSAGES.VALIDATION_CUSTOM_01: Date must be between today and 1 year from now
